/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++0x -g  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/ShadowViewer.dir/glfw_window.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ShadowViewer.dir/glmath.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ShadowViewer.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ShadowViewer.dir/shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ShadowViewer.dir/ShadowViewer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ShadowViewer.dir/Mesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ShadowViewer.dir/sphere.cpp.o  -o ../ShadowViewer -lGLEW ../liblodePNG.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglfw.so.3.2 -lGLEW -lGL -lGLU
